Section.Catchline: Harassment of hunters, trappers, or fishers.

Subsection.Text: A person may not intentionally, within a publicly or privately owned wildlife management or fish management area or on any state-owned water body:

Paragraph.Text: Interfere with or attempt to prevent the lawful taking of fish, game, or nongame animals by another.
Attempt to disturb fish, game, or nongame animals or attempt to affect their behavior with the intent to prevent their lawful taking by another.

Subsection.Text: Any person who violates this section commits a Level Two violation under s. 379.401.
